title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation
text: Rajeev (2025). Homework6: Sparse Numeric Vector Implementation. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {Homework6: Sparse Numeric Vector Implementation},   author = {Akash Rajeev},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: Sparse Numeric Vector Implementation
text: goal Homework6 create package allows basic operations sparse matrices. Contains several methods relating development sparse matrices, including arithmetic operations, statistical operations, display operations.

title: Sparse Numeric Vector Implementation
text: can install development version Homework6 github like :

title: Sparse Numeric Vector Implementation
code: library(Homework6) #>  #> Attaching package: 'Homework6' #> The following object is masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     norm  # Create a regular numeric vector regular_vec = c(0, 1.5, 0, 0, 2.3, 0, 0, 4.1, 0, 0)  # Convert to sparse format sparse_vec = as(regular_vec, "sparse_numeric") print(sparse_vec) #> Sparse Numeric Vector (length = 10 ) #> Non-zero values: #>   position value #> 1        2   1.5 #> 2        5   2.3 #> 3        8   4.1  # Create another sparse vector regular_vec2 = c(0, 0.5, 0, 1.0, 2.3, 0, 0, 0, 3.2, 0) sparse_vec2 = as(regular_vec2, "sparse_numeric")  # Arithmetic operations sum_vec = sparse_vec + sparse_vec2 diff_vec = sparse_vec - sparse_vec2 product_vec = sparse_vec * sparse_vec2
